metadata.title: CVE-2013-0722 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the scan_load_hosts function in ec_scan.c inEttercap 0.7.5.1 and earlier might allow local users to gain privileges viaa Trojan horse hosts list containing a long line.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0722` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ettercap-common - 1:0.8.0-11
ettercap-graphical - 1:0.8.0-11
ettercap-text-only - 1:0.8.0-11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ettercap package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.8.0-11').
